moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Get Shadow Copy Storage Info
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will attempt to get volume shadow copy storage info.
        This is based on the VSSOwn Script originally posted by
        Tim Tomes and Mark Baggett.

        Works on win2k3 and later.
author: theLightCosine <theLightCosine@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SMBPass
options.description: The password for the specified username

options.name: SMBDomain
options.description: The Windows domain to use for authentication

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: Timeout for WMI command in seconds
